Pre-Game Insights: The Pelicans are 1-15 on the road. New Orleans averages 14.2 turnovers per game and is 5-10 when winning the turnover battle.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Wizards are 5-13 on their home court. Washington allows 122.2 points to opponents and has been outscored by 12.9 points per game.
Others: CJ McCollum scored 50 points in the Pelicans' 132-120 win over the Washington Wizards.
Jordan Poole is scoring 21.8 points per game with 2.7 rebounds and 5.0 assists for the Wizards.
Yves Missi is scoring 9.4 points per game and averaging 8.5 rebounds for the Pelicans.
